description: If you need some more interesting games for Steam Deck (and desktop Linux!), Fanatical launched the Build your own Play on the Go - Elite Collection.
title: Fanatical just launched an Elite Collection Steam Deck bundle

description: Trialforge Studio and Tate Multimedia are bringing their party-based soulslike set in a harsh world where Faith clashes with Science to Steam on August 8th and it should be good to go for Steam Deck players.
title: Party-based soulslike Deathbound aims to be Steam Deck Verified at release

description: Bloobs Adventure is an idle game with a difference, bringing together adventuring and RPG styled mechanics into a more casual game.
title: Immersive idle RPG 'Bloobs Adventure' recently got lots of Steam Deck improvements

description: In November 2022, we started a side project in my company, a video game called Cuprum 2929. Because I love Linux (being a full user since 2009) and I'm the owner of the company, I made the bold decision to fully develop it on Linux.
title: Developing a Video Game with Unreal Engine 5 on Linux

description: Build various contraptions in an almost Zachtronics-like automation puzzle game, Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory is quite reasonably priced and is available now with a demo you can try too.
title: Open-ended physics building-puzzler Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory is out now with a demo

description: Poor old Vampires, they've been through a lot right? Well as a Vampire Therapist, it's your job to deal with all their weird issues.
title: Guide vampires through centuries of emotional baggage in Vampire Therapist - out now

description: Once you've blasted through The Immortal Lock quake mod I covered recently, why not jump into BONK JAM which is quite hilarious looking.
title: It's officially Hammer time! In the BONK JAM mod for Quake

description: Oxygen Not Included has a new expansion out with The Frosty Planet Pack, which seems like a chill way to blow through another few hundred hours.
title: Oxygen Not Included: The Frosty Planet Pack is out now

description: ZOOM Platform put out a major update for FlatOut 1, 2 and Ultimate Carnage with all three now Steam Deck Verified.
title: FlatOut 1, 2 and Ultimate Carnage now Steam Deck Verified with Steam Workshop support
